repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A composite manuscript containing:
A Poṉṉilakkam (Indien 434a).
A Poṉṉilakkam followed by a Nellilakkam (Indien 434b).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (June 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark on recto.

supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation. Some folios truncated.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 434 (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark in black ink: N° 23. bis. (f[2]v). This is the number in Velanguani Arokium' catalogue, first numbered list (f. 4r, nos. 17, 22 et 23).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Not dated by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not later than first mention in a catalogue. Not after 1833 as donated in that year by Reydellet.

provenance.p:
Most probably a manuscript owned by Reydellet as indicated by the shelfmark in black ink N° 23. bis. (Indien 434b, U4, f[2]v), which most probably refers to the number in Velanguani Arokium's catalogue (1845), first numbered list (f. 4r, nos. 17, 22 et 23).
See item 26 (Arithmetique) in Liste des manuscrits Tamouls donnés à la Bibliothèque du Roi par M. Reydelet (NAF 5441, f311v).

acquisition.p: Received, May 27th, 1833, from Reydellet (officier de marine en retraite au Havre). See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1, no. 49 (Arithmetique).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 62, no. 434.
Velanguani Arokium (Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam). 1845. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls de la Bibliothèque royale. Manuscript, BnF NAF 5443. — See f. 4r, nos. 17, 22 et 23.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 99r, no. 402 434.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
